attributes.action: If India is off the red list then so should Bangladesh and Pakistan
attributes.background: Infections in Bangladesh and Pakistan are on similar level to India. Bangladesh and Pakistan were put on the red list before India and now India comes out of it. So should Bangladesh and Pakistan.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the following petition currently open on this topic:

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
